thread.title: Only 10% startups will be very successful: Former Infosys director Mohandas Pai
thread.title_full: Only 10% startups will be very successful: Former Infosys director Mohandas Pai

title: Only 10% startups will be very successful: Former Infosys director Mohandas Pai
text: Only 10% startups will be very successful: Former Infosys director Mohandas Pai Sunday, 25 October 2015 (23 minutes ago) Even as the startup ecosystem is thriving in the country, former Infosys director T V Mohandas Pai believes that only 10 percent of the new-age companies would be successful while a majority of these would fail. Startups are set to emerge as a major job creator in the country if government evolves an enabling policy environment for these budding firms, say Pai. Typically about 10 percent of the startups will do very well, about 25 percent will stay afloat, and the rest will fail, Pai told PTI. If Prime Minister Narendra Modiâ€™s Digital India initiative takes wings, the startup ecosystem will thrive with over 1 lakh new-age firms in next 10 years, employing 3.5 million people and targeting a value
